articles.title: "Europe's Choices": S Jaishankar Slams Double Standards Over Russian Oil - NDTV
articles.description: India on Monday stoutly defended its import of crude oil from Russia amid the Ukraine conflict with Foreign Minister S Jaishankar asserting that New Delhi's procurement was just one-sixth of the European purchase in the last nine months.
articles.content:
S Jaishankar strongly justified India's import of crude oil from Russia.
